channel.title: perforce Tutorial on
channel.description: Recent content in perforce Tutorial on

item.title: Getting started with perforce
item.description: Installation or Setup # Detailed instructions on getting perforce set up or installed.

item.title: Setup Perforce login details in Windows cmd
item.description: After installing perforce and setup your workspace through p4v, you could set up your workspace in Windows cmd. Setup Perforce login details in Windows cmd # After installing perforce and setup your workspace through p4v, you could set up your workspace in Windows cmd. The command you need is: p4 set Set your server p4 set P4PORT= xx.xxx.xx.xxx:xxxxx Set your user name p4 set P4USER=username Set your password In terms of setting your password, you could just set your password in plain text by the following command:

item.title: Stream Management
item.description: This topic will be an overview of the rules and functionality regarding streams in Perforce. Stream Types # Streams come in three flavors. Release streams (yellow), Mainlines (Grey) and Development (Blue). Each stream has a different purpose and rules related to its function.
